content: this legal text summarizes a court decision regarding the division of an inheritance among the heirs the court dissolved the community inheritance and assigned specific shares of the property to each heir the first heir received a villa garage and deposit worth €412800 the second heir received a commercial premises and a fiat topolino worth €164000 the third heir received another commercial premises worth €14942181 the court also addressed rental income and adjustments for work done on the properties the judgment was based on the civil code and various legal principles considering objections raised by the parties the court determined the value of the estate and formed the shares based on the respective ownership percentages of the heirs the judgment is considered final and the costs of the litigation are to be borne by the estate the court made a final decision regarding the division of property among the coheirs specifying the shares and adjustments for each heir the costs have been compensated and the decision was made on may 30 2023
